name: UpdateIncidentStatus
description:
Create a status update for a specific incident.

Use this tool to update the status of a specific incident in PagerDuty. It allows for optional customization of the email notification through the `subject` and `html_message` properties.

parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.description: The ID of the incident to update. This is required to specify which incident the status update is for.

parameters.name: accept_header
parameters.description: Versioning information for the API request, provided via the 'Accept' header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the request payload. Use 'application/json'.

parameters.name: requestor_email
parameters.description: The email address of a valid user making the request in PagerDuty.

value_schema.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

parameters.name: incident_status_update_details
parameters.description: JSON containing the message for the status update, and optional subject and html_message for custom email notifications.

message.description: The message to be posted as a status update.

subject.description: The subject to be sent for the custom html email status update. Required if sending custom html email.

html_message.description: The html content to be sent for the custom html email status update. Required if sending custom html email.
